Place down the sponge onto the countertop to free up the right hand.
Lift up the countertop protector using the right hand to check to see if there's any food or dirt beneath it.
place the glass countertop protector out of the way so that underneath it can be cleaned
Place the food bin down on the floor out of the way using the left hand.
Place the sponge down onto the side of the countertop using the left hand.
Lift up the glass countertop protector using both hands.
Stack the glass countertop protector onto the top of the other glass countertop protector using both hands.
Lift up the recipe book using both hands.
Grab hold of the sponge and wipe down the surface near the bain-marie using the right hand.
Place the recipe book down onto the countertop using the left hand.
pick up both glass countertop protectors using both hands
Rotate the glass countertop protectors and place them down onto the countertop out of the way so that a large surface of the countertop is available.
Place down the sponge on top of the countertop using the left hand.
Pick up the large plastic spoon from the countertop using the right hand.
Place the large plastic spoon down onto the side of the countertop using the right hand.
Pick up the recording phone using the right hand.
